title: #132 - Blaise Pascal
description: Time to Blaise it up! This week Connor and Dan discuss French philosopher, mathematician, and all around genius Blaise Pascal. In addition to being what Connor called "a fuck-ugly guy with a hunchback," Pascal is responsible for some pretty interesting writing on Christian faith. Also in this episode: Some really great ideas for Spencer's Gifts t-shirts. Enjoy!
